caption.center: STATE of Hawaii, Plaintiff-Appellee-Respondent vs. Nathan ORTIZ,

opinion.posture: Certiorari to the Intermediate Court of Appeals (Cr. No. 98-2142).
opinion.attorneys: Hayden Aluli for defendant-appellant-petitioner on the writ.
opinion.panel: MOON, C.J., LEVINSON, NAKAYAMA, RAMIL, and ACOBA, JJ.
opinion.opinion_byline: Opinion of the Court by MOON, C.J.
opinion.opinion_text: ORDER DENYING APPLICATION FOR WRIT OF CERTIORARI Upon consideration of the application for a writ of certiorari filed on November 22, 2000 by the defendant-appellant-petitioner Nathan Ortiz, the same is hereby denied.
